name: Apex Predator Island
description:
Hm. We got a bit of a rat problem on the island... Nothing a few snakes can't solve.

Welp. Wonder where the rats went? Why are there snakes everywhere? Who would want to live on an island of snakes? Maybe we should get an eagle to come eat the snakes.

OH JEEZ SO MANY BIRDS THEY ARE EATING EVERYTHING NOO

THEY ARE GOING TO RUN OUT OF FOOD

Poor birds. No food. So many bodies.

Oh well.
